name: Saab AB
membership: Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD), Kangaroo Group, Swedish Security and Defence Industry (SOFF) SPN.
goal: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions ranging from military defence to civil security. Saab has operations and employees on all continents and constantly develops, adopts and improves new technology to meet customers’ changing needs.
interests: Budget, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Intra-Community Transfers Directive (2009/43/EC)
Defence Procurement Directive (2009/81/EC)
European Defence Action Plan
European Defence Industry Development Programme

Horizon 2020
